content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253012,"originalJapaneseLine":"このツングース平原の奥に目的の２−４キノコがある","translatedEnglishLine":"Deep in this Tunguska Plain lies the target 2-4 mushrooms."},{"lineNumber":253013,"originalJapaneseLine":"歩いていると、雹がふってきた","translatedEnglishLine":"While walking, hail began to fall."},{"lineNumber":253014,"originalJapaneseLine":"いた、いた・・岩陰に隠れろー","translatedEnglishLine":"There it is, there it is... Hide behind the rock!"},{"lineNumber":253015,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達は雹の直撃を受けてダメージを受けた","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others took direct hits from the hail and took damage."},{"lineNumber":253016,"originalJapaneseLine":"　※汎用で使います","translatedEnglishLine":"*This will be used generally."},{"lineNumber":253017,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、バボラの陣地","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, Babora's camp."},{"lineNumber":253018,"originalJapaneseLine":"親衛隊のボス、魔物将軍が陣地を見てまわっている","translatedEnglishLine":"The boss of the guards, the demon general, is inspecting the camp."},{"lineNumber":253019,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼らは魔物兵にも仕事をさせているが、雑用は捕まえた人間達を奴隷用にこき使っている。","translatedEnglishLine":"They make the monster soldiers work, but the captured humans are used as slaves for menial tasks."},{"lineNumber":253020,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゴミ掃除とか、バボラの飯、バボラの掃除など、やらせている。","translatedEnglishLine":"They are made to do things like garbage cleanup, cooking for Babora, cleaning Babora's quarters, and so on."},{"lineNumber":253021,"originalJapaneseLine":"この中に　アナセル　がいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"Anasell is among them."},{"lineNumber":253022,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラ様の本日の作戦が完了しました。よし、夕飯のご用意をしろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Babora's mission for today has been completed. Alright, prepare dinner."},{"lineNumber":253023,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t巨大化の材料であるキノコを見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"Find the mushroom which is the material for gigantification."},{"lineNumber":253024,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tかなみを巨大化させる","translatedEnglishLine":"Make Kanami gigantic."},{"lineNumber":253025,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスが巨大かなみにいたずらしようとする","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance tries to prank gigantic Kanami."},{"lineNumber":253026,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tこの作戦は駄目だなぁと失敗","translatedEnglishLine":"This plan is no good and fails."},{"lineNumber":253027,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t遠くのバボラが食事をしているの見てピンと来る","translatedEnglishLine":"Seeing Babora eating in the distance, something clicks."},{"lineNumber":253028,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t＜ＣＧ：巨大かなみ＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<CG: Gigantic Kanami>"},{"lineNumber":253029,"originalJapaneseLine":"＜ＣＧ：バボラ登場＞","translatedEnglishLine":"<CG: Babora appears>"},{"lineNumber":253030,"originalJapaneseLine":"ラングバウ","translatedEnglishLine":"Rangbau"},{"lineNumber":253031,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラ大統領のシーン、いつもの仕事","translatedEnglishLine":"Scene of President Sheila, usual duties."},{"lineNumber":253032,"originalJapaneseLine":"そしてランスが現れて大統領はここまで、今から奴隷だとか","translatedEnglishLine":"Then Lance appears, saying the president's role ends here, now it’s time to be slaves or something."},{"lineNumber":253033,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌日","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day."},{"lineNumber":253034,"originalJapaneseLine":"バボラを倒す方法は思いついた、任せておけと","translatedEnglishLine":"I've come up with a way to defeat Babora. Leave it to me."},{"lineNumber":253035,"originalJapaneseLine":"シーラを見送りを受けながら出発","translatedEnglishLine":"Departing while being seen off by Sheila."},{"lineNumber":253036,"originalJapaneseLine":"まずいな、バボラを目指してきたが、魔軍のど真ん中に紛れ込んでしまったようだ","translatedEnglishLine":"This is bad, we headed toward Babora but it seems we've gotten right into the heart of the demon army."},{"lineNumber":253037,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみ、お前が偵察をミスったせいだ。バカ","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami, it’s your fault for messing up the reconnaissance. Idiot."},{"lineNumber":253038,"originalJapaneseLine":"ごめんなさい","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m sorry."},{"lineNumber":253039,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵勢力圏内でピンチになるランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and the others are in trouble deep in enemy territory."},{"lineNumber":253040,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに上杉軍（５千）が現れて助かる","translatedEnglishLine":"Then the Uesugi army (5,000 troops) appears and rescues them."},{"lineNumber":253041,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスと謙信の再開","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and Kenshin reunite."},{"lineNumber":253042,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人バボラ退治を手伝え同行しろと言うが","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance tells Kenshin to help him defeat the demon Babora and come along."},{"lineNumber":253043,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信は特別焼却師団、残忍焼き殺すと戦っているので断る","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin refuses because he is fighting the special incineration corps, brutally burning people alive."},{"lineNumber":253044,"originalJapaneseLine":"我々はそいつらをなんとかしないといけないのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to do something about those guys."},{"lineNumber":253045,"originalJapaneseLine":"選択肢","translatedEnglishLine":"Choices."},{"lineNumber":253046,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　謙信に同行する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Accompany Kenshin."},{"lineNumber":253047,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　バボラ退治を優先する","translatedEnglishLine":"> Prioritize defeating Babora."},{"lineNumber":253048,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信と一緒に村の救出に向かう","translatedEnglishLine":"Head to rescue the village with Kenshin."},{"lineNumber":253049,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信が真面目一辺倒、何か余裕が無い感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin is all serious, seems like he has no composure."},{"lineNumber":253050,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信がいない所で、愛がランスに相談","translatedEnglishLine":"When Kenshin isn’t around, Ai consults with Lance."},{"lineNumber":253051,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信様は無理している、無茶苦茶な戦いをしている","translatedEnglishLine":"Lord Kenshin is pushing himself, fighting recklessly."},{"lineNumber":253052,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍は非道すぎて許せないのは分かるが、このままでは倒れてしまう","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand the demon army is too cruel to forgive, but at this rate he’ll collapse."},{"lineNumber":253053,"originalJapaneseLine":"注意して見てあげて欲しい","translatedEnglishLine":"I want you to watch over him carefully."},{"lineNumber":253054,"originalJapaneseLine":"村に到着した・・が、すでに","translatedEnglishLine":"We arrived at the village... but already,"},{"lineNumber":253055,"originalJapaneseLine":"ルメイ特別焼却師団が包囲して、村人を逃げられないようにして","translatedEnglishLine":"The Lumei special incineration corps has surrounded it, preventing the villagers from escaping."},{"lineNumber":253056,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲に火を付けていた所だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were just about to set fire all around."},{"lineNumber":253057,"originalJapaneseLine":"謙信が怒り突撃する","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin angrily charges."},{"lineNumber":253058,"originalJapaneseLine":"　軍人同士が殺し合うのは分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand soldiers fighting each other to the death."},{"lineNumber":253059,"originalJapaneseLine":"　民間人が不運にも巻き込まれるのも分かる","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand civilians getting caught up in it by misfortune."},{"lineNumber":253060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　だが、奴らは最初から民間人を殺す為だけに行動している","translatedEnglishLine":"But those guys act solely to kill civilians from the start."},{"lineNumber":253061,"originalJapaneseLine":"　外道、許せぬ","translatedEnglishLine":"Monsters, unforgivable."},{"lineNumber":253062,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちょい待て、敵が多すぎる、それにこちらが来るのを分かって","translatedEnglishLine":"Wait a moment, there are too many enemies, plus they knew we were coming."},{"lineNumber":253063,"originalJapaneseLine":"待ち構えているぞ・・でも謙信は止まらず突っ込む","translatedEnglishLine":"They’re lying in wait... but Kenshin doesn’t stop and charges in."},{"lineNumber":253064,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかたなくランス達も戦闘に参加","translatedEnglishLine":"Reluctantly, Lance and the others join the fight."},{"lineNumber":253065,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（ランスと謙信は別部隊として戦っています　乱戦）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Lance and Kenshin are fighting as separate units in the melee.)"},{"lineNumber":253066,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱戦の中、謙信部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"In the midst of the melee, Kenshin’s unit,"},{"lineNumber":253067,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなり消耗して弱っている謙信、愛が駄目ですいったん退却して下さい","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin is significantly exhausted and weakened; Ai says 'This is no good, please retreat temporarily'."},{"lineNumber":253068,"originalJapaneseLine":"と言っているが聞かない","translatedEnglishLine":"But he doesn’t listen."},{"lineNumber":253069,"originalJapaneseLine":"駄目だ、この外道部隊の指揮官を倒しておかないとまたこのような悲劇が起こる","translatedEnglishLine":"No, we have to defeat the commander of this monster unit or this tragedy will happen again."},{"lineNumber":253070,"originalJapaneseLine":"今やらねばいけないのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"We have to do it now."},{"lineNumber":253071,"originalJapaneseLine":"乱戦の中、謙信の部隊","translatedEnglishLine":"In the chaos of battle, Kenshin's unit."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このツングース平原の奥に目的の２−４キノコがある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Deep in this Tunguska Plain lies the target 2-4 mushrooms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歩いていると、雹がふってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While walking, hail began to fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いた、いた・・岩陰に隠れろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There it is, there it is... Hide behind the rock!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は雹の直撃を受けてダメージを受けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others took direct hits from the hail and took damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※汎用で使います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *This will be used generally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、バボラの陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Babora's camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親衛隊のボス、魔物将軍が陣地を見てまわっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The boss of the guards, the demon general, is inspecting the camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは魔物兵にも仕事をさせているが、雑用は捕まえた人間達を奴隷用にこき使っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They make the monster soldiers work, but the captured humans are used as slaves for menial tasks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴミ掃除とか、バボラの飯、バボラの掃除など、やらせている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are made to do things like garbage cleanup, cooking for Babora, cleaning Babora's quarters, and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この中に　アナセル　がいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anasell is among them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ様の本日の作戦が完了しました。よし、夕飯のご用意をしろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Babora's mission for today has been completed. Alright, prepare dinner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大化の材料であるキノコを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find the mushroom which is the material for gigantification.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみを巨大化させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make Kanami gigantic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが巨大かなみにいたずらしようとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance tries to prank gigantic Kanami.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この作戦は駄目だなぁと失敗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This plan is no good and fails.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くのバボラが食事をしているの見てピンと来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing Babora eating in the distance, something clicks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：巨大かなみ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Gigantic Kanami>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：バボラ登場＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Babora appears>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangbau

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ大統領のシーン、いつもの仕事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scene of President Sheila, usual duties.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてランスが現れて大統領はここまで、今から奴隷だとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Lance appears, saying the president's role ends here, now it’s time to be slaves or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを倒す方法は思いついた、任せておけと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've come up with a way to defeat Babora. Leave it to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラを見送りを受けながら出発
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Departing while being seen off by Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずいな、バボラを目指してきたが、魔軍のど真ん中に紛れ込んでしまったようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, we headed toward Babora but it seems we've gotten right into the heart of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみ、お前が偵察をミスったせいだ。バカ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami, it’s your fault for messing up the reconnaissance. Idiot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごめんなさい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵勢力圏内でピンチになるランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others are in trouble deep in enemy territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに上杉軍（５千）が現れて助かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the Uesugi army (5,000 troops) appears and rescues them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと謙信の再開
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and Kenshin reunite.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラ退治を手伝え同行しろと言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance tells Kenshin to help him defeat the demon Babora and come along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信は特別焼却師団、残忍焼き殺すと戦っているので断る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin refuses because he is fighting the special incineration corps, brutally burning people alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々はそいつらをなんとかしないといけないのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to do something about those guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択肢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choices.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　謙信に同行する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Accompany Kenshin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　バボラ退治を優先する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Prioritize defeating Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信と一緒に村の救出に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Head to rescue the village with Kenshin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信が真面目一辺倒、何か余裕が無い感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin is all serious, seems like he has no composure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信がいない所で、愛がランスに相談
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Kenshin isn’t around, Ai consults with Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信様は無理している、無茶苦茶な戦いをしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kenshin is pushing himself, fighting recklessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は非道すぎて許せないのは分かるが、このままでは倒れてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand the demon army is too cruel to forgive, but at this rate he’ll collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 注意して見てあげて欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to watch over him carefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村に到着した・・が、すでに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrived at the village... but already,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイ特別焼却師団が包囲して、村人を逃げられないようにして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Lumei special incineration corps has surrounded it, preventing the villagers from escaping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲に火を付けていた所だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were just about to set fire all around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信が怒り突撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin angrily charges.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍人同士が殺し合うのは分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand soldiers fighting each other to the death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 民間人が不運にも巻き込まれるのも分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand civilians getting caught up in it by misfortune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、奴らは最初から民間人を殺す為だけに行動している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But those guys act solely to kill civilians from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外道、許せぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters, unforgivable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょい待て、敵が多すぎる、それにこちらが来るのを分かって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment, there are too many enemies, plus they knew we were coming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待ち構えているぞ・・でも謙信は止まらず突っ込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re lying in wait... but Kenshin doesn’t stop and charges in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたなくランス達も戦闘に参加
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reluctantly, Lance and the others join the fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランスと謙信は別部隊として戦っています　乱戦）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Lance and Kenshin are fighting as separate units in the melee.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱戦の中、謙信部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the midst of the melee, Kenshin’s unit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり消耗して弱っている謙信、愛が駄目ですいったん退却して下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin is significantly exhausted and weakened; Ai says 'This is no good, please retreat temporarily'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言っているが聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he doesn’t listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だ、この外道部隊の指揮官を倒しておかないとまたこのような悲劇が起こる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, we have to defeat the commander of this monster unit or this tragedy will happen again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今やらねばいけないのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to do it now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱戦の中、謙信の部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the chaos of battle, Kenshin's unit.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このツングース平原の奥に目的の２−４キノコがある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Deep in this Tunguska Plain lies the target 2-4 mushrooms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 歩いていると、雹がふってきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While walking, hail began to fall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いた、いた・・岩陰に隠れろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There it is, there it is... Hide behind the rock!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は雹の直撃を受けてダメージを受けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others took direct hits from the hail and took damage.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※汎用で使います
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *This will be used generally.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、バボラの陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, Babora's camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親衛隊のボス、魔物将軍が陣地を見てまわっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The boss of the guards, the demon general, is inspecting the camp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼らは魔物兵にも仕事をさせているが、雑用は捕まえた人間達を奴隷用にこき使っている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They make the monster soldiers work, but the captured humans are used as slaves for menial tasks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゴミ掃除とか、バボラの飯、バボラの掃除など、やらせている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They are made to do things like garbage cleanup, cooking for Babora, cleaning Babora's quarters, and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この中に　アナセル　がいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anasell is among them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラ様の本日の作戦が完了しました。よし、夕飯のご用意をしろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Babora's mission for today has been completed. Alright, prepare dinner.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大化の材料であるキノコを見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Find the mushroom which is the material for gigantification.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみを巨大化させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Make Kanami gigantic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが巨大かなみにいたずらしようとする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance tries to prank gigantic Kanami.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この作戦は駄目だなぁと失敗
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This plan is no good and fails.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 遠くのバボラが食事をしているの見てピンと来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Seeing Babora eating in the distance, something clicks.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：巨大かなみ＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Gigantic Kanami>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ＣＧ：バボラ登場＞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: <CG: Babora appears>

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ラングバウ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rangbau

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラ大統領のシーン、いつもの仕事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Scene of President Sheila, usual duties.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そしてランスが現れて大統領はここまで、今から奴隷だとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then Lance appears, saying the president's role ends here, now it’s time to be slaves or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バボラを倒す方法は思いついた、任せておけと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've come up with a way to defeat Babora. Leave it to me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シーラを見送りを受けながら出発
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Departing while being seen off by Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まずいな、バボラを目指してきたが、魔軍のど真ん中に紛れ込んでしまったようだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is bad, we headed toward Babora but it seems we've gotten right into the heart of the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみ、お前が偵察をミスったせいだ。バカ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami, it’s your fault for messing up the reconnaissance. Idiot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ごめんなさい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵勢力圏内でピンチになるランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others are in trouble deep in enemy territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そこに上杉軍（５千）が現れて助かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then the Uesugi army (5,000 troops) appears and rescues them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスと謙信の再開
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and Kenshin reunite.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人バボラ退治を手伝え同行しろと言うが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance tells Kenshin to help him defeat the demon Babora and come along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信は特別焼却師団、残忍焼き殺すと戦っているので断る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin refuses because he is fighting the special incineration corps, brutally burning people alive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々はそいつらをなんとかしないといけないのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to do something about those guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択肢
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choices.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　謙信に同行する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Accompany Kenshin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　バボラ退治を優先する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Prioritize defeating Babora.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信と一緒に村の救出に向かう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Head to rescue the village with Kenshin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信が真面目一辺倒、何か余裕が無い感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin is all serious, seems like he has no composure.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信がいない所で、愛がランスに相談
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Kenshin isn’t around, Ai consults with Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信様は無理している、無茶苦茶な戦いをしている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lord Kenshin is pushing himself, fighting recklessly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は非道すぎて許せないのは分かるが、このままでは倒れてしまう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand the demon army is too cruel to forgive, but at this rate he’ll collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 注意して見てあげて欲しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want you to watch over him carefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 村に到着した・・が、すでに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We arrived at the village... but already,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイ特別焼却師団が包囲して、村人を逃げられないようにして
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Lumei special incineration corps has surrounded it, preventing the villagers from escaping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲に火を付けていた所だった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were just about to set fire all around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 謙信が怒り突撃する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin angrily charges.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軍人同士が殺し合うのは分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand soldiers fighting each other to the death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 民間人が不運にも巻き込まれるのも分かる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I understand civilians getting caught up in it by misfortune.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、奴らは最初から民間人を殺す為だけに行動している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But those guys act solely to kill civilians from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外道、許せぬ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Monsters, unforgivable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょい待て、敵が多すぎる、それにこちらが来るのを分かって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a moment, there are too many enemies, plus they knew we were coming.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待ち構えているぞ・・でも謙信は止まらず突っ込む
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re lying in wait... but Kenshin doesn’t stop and charges in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかたなくランス達も戦闘に参加
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reluctantly, Lance and the others join the fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランスと謙信は別部隊として戦っています　乱戦）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Lance and Kenshin are fighting as separate units in the melee.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱戦の中、謙信部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the midst of the melee, Kenshin’s unit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなり消耗して弱っている謙信、愛が駄目ですいったん退却して下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin is significantly exhausted and weakened; Ai says 'This is no good, please retreat temporarily'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と言っているが聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But he doesn’t listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 駄目だ、この外道部隊の指揮官を倒しておかないとまたこのような悲劇が起こる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, we have to defeat the commander of this monster unit or this tragedy will happen again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今やらねばいけないのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have to do it now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 乱戦の中、謙信の部隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the chaos of battle, Kenshin's unit.
